valueobjects
Class Continent

java.lang.Object
  valueobjects.Continent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Iterable<Territory>
Direct Known Subclasses:
Africa, Asia, Australia, Europe, NorthAmerica, SouthAmerica
public abstract class Continent
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<Territory>, java.io.Serializable

An abstract class that represents a continent on the board. It holds all the territories that make up the continent as a list.

Author:
Jannes
See Also:

Method Detail

iterator

public java.util.Iterator<Territory> iterator()
Returns an iterator which can be used to iterate over all the territories of the continent.
Although it is possible, territories should not be removed from the list.

Specified by:
